rows: An off-duty policeman is murdered by Islamic rebels.
Fedayeen suicide bomber kills twenty-three people, mostly Iraqi National Guardsmen in a terrorist attack.
Radical Sunnis machine-gun four cops to death as they sit in their car.
Hamas rockets kill a 25-year-old man working in the industrial zone. Two others are injured.
Algeria's Salafist Group for Preaching and Combat bombs a convoy then rakes it with machine-gun fire, killing eighteen people and injuring an unknown number.
Ansar al-Sunna Islamists kidnap and decapitate an Iraqi, then booby-trap the headless body with a bomb that kills a police officer.
Three suicide bombers blow themselves to Allah in separate attacks, taking sixteen other souls with them.  Over forty others sustain burns, open wounds and lost limbs.
Iraqi governor, an advocate for democracy, is gunned down along with six of his guards by Islamic theocrats.
Fedayeen 'Holy Warrior' rams a checkpoint with a truck full of explosives, killing ten and injuring at least sixty, including women and children.
A husband and wife, their son and two other relatives are murdered in their home in an 'honor killing' by a group of armed men.
Muslims murder a Thai village official from the back of a motorcycle as he is driving to work.
A series of Mujahideen attacks across the country leaves seventeen dead, nineteen wounded and six others, including two college students kidnapped.
Four civilians and two Indian police suffer injuries when the Mujahideen hurl a grenade into a city street.
Fedayeen suicide car bomber kills at least twenty outside a police graduation ceremony.  About four dozen others are badly hurt.
al-Qaeda group sends a suicide bomber into a security point.  Six dead and thirteen injured.
Fedayeen militants from the al-Mansoorian outfit storm a government building with grenades, leaving at least four dead.
The bodies of eighteen Shia laborers abducted and shot execution style by Sunni radicals are unearthed in a field.
An Israeli motorist is killed by a Palestinian sniper.  Three others are injured, two critically.
Terrorists assassinate a shop owner in a bloody attack.
Sunni attack on the vehicle of a Shia cleric leaves two of his guards dead.
An Israeli officer is killed, and three others injured, in a Hezbollah rocket attack along the Lebanese border.
Shia burn six Sunnis alive after herding them into a house in a revenge for an earlier attack on a Shiite leader.
Eight Ukrainian bomb sappers, and one Kazakh are killed by the 'Islamic Army' in a terrorist bombing attack.
Fedayeen suicide bombing leave six police dead and a dozen injured.  Police chief also assassinated in Baghdad, along with his son.
Islamic gunmen kill two security guards outside a government building.
Moro Islamic Front stages a surprise attack on government post, killing eight Philippine soldiers.
A school security guard is murdered by Islamists.
Janjaweed militias murder fifteen villagers in a raid.
Seven Iraqi civilians are killed when militants destroy their minibus with a roadside bomb.
Six Afghan soldiers are kidnapped and executed by the Taliban.
Mujahideen attack on a government car leaves four civilians dead.
Radical Sunnis shoot a Shia cleric and his son to death on the street, along with four of their bodyguards.
Palestinians use explosives and arms fire to murder an Israeli officer in the process of constructing a security fence.
Islamic fundamentalists throw a hand grenade into a cinema showing a soccer game, killing four innocents.
Islamic gunmen riddle a civilian minivan with machine-gun fire as it is picking up a Turkish businessman.
A car bomb outside a Shia mosque kills seven people and injures another thirty, some critically.
Three Palestinian suicide bombers infiltrate the security wall, via an explosion, and murder six Israelis.  Four others are wounded.
Muslim militants thought responsible for the bombing of a bus station.
Terrorists kill two civilians and severely injure a 5-year-old girl.
The Mujahideen enter a civilian's house and kill his 20-year-old daughter.
Islamic militants set off bombs at two different carnivals killing three and injuring about ninety others, including stage performers.
Islamic terrorists kill four policemen in two separate shootouts in Dagestan (Kaspiisk & Makhachkala).
Al-Mansoorian terrorists storm a passport office and kill two government employees.
Grenade thrown into an election rally by the Mujahideen kills two people and injures seventeen.
Muslims plant a bomb in a Thai restaurant, killing the owner and injuring sixty others.
Eight people are killed by a suicide bomber, with another 25 injured, some critically.
Jihadists attack a police checkpoint with machine-guns, killing eight.
Three civilians are killed as a dedicated Muslim blows himself to Allah.  Nine others injured.
The bodies of three civilians and one soldier are found in a field, brutally slain, with handwriting declaring them to be traitors to the cause of Allah.
A civilian is gunned down by Muslim militants.
Sunni takes two members of a Shia political party with him to 'paradise.'  Car bombing injures nine others as well.
Palestinian suicide bomber murders a father of three and injures seven others.
17-year-old Israeli girl dies trying to protect her 10-year-old brother from a Hamas rocket attack (on 1-15).
At least three killed as militant Muslims go on a wild shooting and arson spree.
Salafists slit the throat of a motorist stopped at a phony roadblock.
The Islamic government bombs a village in Darfur, killing more than a hundred people, mostly women and children.  An unknown number are wounded.
Pakistani fuel truck driver and two assistants are murdered by the Taliban in a senseless attack.
Three al-Qaeda suicide bombings leave more than two dozen dead and scores of civilians badly injured.  One of the targets was the Australian embassy.
Three people are killed by Islamic fundamentalists in a cemetery.  Five others are injured.
The Mujahideen kidnap three civilians and torture two of them, eventually killing one.
Radical Sunnis car bomb a Shia mosque as the victims celebrate a religious holiday.  Fourteen are killed, and about forty injured.
Suicide bomber drives an ambulance full of explosives into a Shia wedding party, slaughtering a dozen, including women and children and injuring dozens more including the bride and groom.
Four people, including a police chief and two relatives, are killed by a Taliban roadside bomb.
Two truck drivers are kidnapped and beheaded on a public street as executioners chant 'Allah Akbar.'
Islamic fundamentalists attack a security patrol killing two police and injuring one civilian.
Janjaweed militia attack several villages, burning houses and killing a dozen innocents.
The Mujahideen gun down an orchard worker (Shopian) and toss a grenade into a bus stop.
A government worker is murdered by Islamists.
Islamic insurgents kill sixteen people in various shooting attacks, including the 5-year-old daughter of a policeman.
Seven Iraqis are killed by two Jihad car bombings.
Sunni radicals pack a tractor with explosives and detonate it outside a Kurdish political office, killing at least a dozen.
Four people, including a 73-year-old man are assassinated by Muslim radicals in a grenade attack as they leave a public meeting.
Islamic fundamentalists lob a grenade into an opposition political rally, killing a former finance minister and at least four others.  About one hundred people are injured, some badly.
The Mujahideen abduct and kill an Indian government employee and his son.
Two grenades tossed by the Mujahideen at an election office injure twenty-six people, almost all civilians.
Three civilians are killed, and seven injured by a Sunni bomber.
Three civilians, including two women, are killed in a Jihad bombing attack.
A Christian woman is shot to death by Muslim troops in the troubled African province.
A civilian is brutally tortured to death by MILF terrorists.
Jihad suicide bomber kills nine Chechen policemen after crashing his car into theirs at full speed.
Four Iraqis are killed by a Fedayeen suicide car bomber.
Nine Afghan soldiers are blown to bits by the Taliban while riding in a pickup truck near the Pakistani border.
Islamic militants hit the U.S. embassy with a rocket, killing two Americans.
A string of suicide attacks by theocratic fanatics kill over forty Iraqis in an effort to prevent the citizenry from exercising their right to vote in elections.
Islamic militants kill two people in a shootout.
Jamaat-e-Islami terrorists kill a business man with a bomb in a shopping center.
The Mujahideen break into a house and kill a woman, then kidnap and hang her student son.
Four members of a family, including three children and their mother, are killed when the Mujahideen hurl a grenade into a house after knocking down the door.
Muslims kill a civilian in front of his home.
MILF terrorists attack a security patrol, killing four members.
A former school administrator is gunned down by Islamic militants.
Dagestani Islamists kill a high-ranking government official and three others in a shooting ambush on their vehicle.
Takfir wa Hijra (Islamist) terrorists stop a bus full of unarmed Iraqi recruits.  Twelve are dragged off and shot execution-style.
A school teacher is one of three civilians killed in three separate shooting attacks by Islamic terrorists.
Two people are shot to death by Sunni radicals for voting in the election.
Two people escape after being kidnapped from their village by the Mujahideen, but another is executed.
Militant Muslims attack a Christian village in Nigeria, killing at least three dozen and displacing some three thousand others.
A 23-year-old woman is killed by her youngest brother at a bus stop because she 'dishonored' the family by refusing to marry her cousin.
Fedayeen suicide bomber kills himself and at least fifteen others who were seeking jobs outside a police station.
Suicidal extremist kills a dozen police who were guarding a teaching hospital, by pretending to need assistance from the officers.
al-Qaeda militants ambush four journalists riding in a car.  Two are murdered.
Muslim separatists attack Philippine troops, killing a dozen.
A defense volunteer is murdered by Islamic extremists.
Shaheed suicide bomber blows himself to paradise, along with nearly two dozen others.  About thirty are seriously wounded in the street attack.
Shiite radicals gun down an Iraqi journalist and his 3-year-old son in front of their home.
A BBC director dies of her wounds suffered in an attack by Islamic gunmen.
Thai Islamists set off a bomb in a market stall, killing one villager and injuring two others.
The decomposing bodies of twenty-one Iraqi truck drivers hauling food are found two days after their convoy was ambushed by Islamic radicals.  They had all been burned inside their vehicles.
Sunni gunmen block off a street with their cars and then mow down Shia patrons at a bakery, killing eleven and injuring a unknown number of others.
Suicidal fanatic detonates a massive bomb using a vegetable truck outside a Shia mosque, killing over a dozen and injuring more than forty.
Thai Muslims shoot a Buddhist shopkeeper to death, then trigger a bomb that kills another person and injures two dozen.
A policeman is gunned down by Islamists.
An Iraqi translator and his son are gunned down by Islamists near their home.
Twenty-five people are injured when the Mujahideen toss a grenade into a crowded street.
Sunni extremists spray the inside of a passenger car with automatic weapons, killing an Iraqi officer and two companions.
A powerful Hezbollah suicide bomb blast kills the former Lebanese Prime Minister and fourteen others.  One-hundred and twenty are injured in the blast.
A 12-year-old boy is killed in an Abu Sayyaf bombing at a bus stop.  Eight others are injured.
An bomb outside a shopping mall kills five shoppers and injures at least three dozen others.  Abu Sayyaf claims responsibility.
The Abu Sayyaf terrorist group detonates a bomb in the Philippine capital outside a crowded bus terminal, setting three buses on fire and killing at least three.
Muslim separatists shoot a 48-year-old man off of a motorcycle, injuring his wife as well.
Muslims shoot two people, including a teenage girl, to death in an attack on a karaoke club.
Sectarian shooting attack leaves three dead Sunnis and fourteen others injured.
Three people are killed in an IED attack by Islamic separatists.
Mujahideen toss a grenade into a bus stop, killing one and injuring seven.  Elsewhere (Rajouri) they kidnap and kill a 60-year-old man.
Christian taxi driver gunned down after refusing to convert back to Islam.
Three truck drivers are murdered by Islamic terrorists.
Bombing kills two and injures five near a hotel.
Three civilians are among five people murdered at point-blank range by Jihad gunmen.
Two people in a religious procession are killed by a Fedayeen suicide bomber on a city street.
Another suicide bomber blows himself to Allah outside a Shia mosque, taking at least ten others with him.
Suicide bomber kills fifteen Shia worshippers inside a mosque just as Friday prayers are beginning.  Another two dozen are injured.
Islamists bomb a Christian-owned gas station, killing two people.
Muslim separatists kill six people near a hotel hosting a wedding reception with a powerful car bomb.
The Salafist Group for Preaching and Combat ambush and kill four soldiers in remote Algeria.
Eight suicide attacks by Fedayeen 'Holy Warriors' (including one on a bicycle), along with a bus explosion kill at least forty innocent people and injure over one-hundred.
Militants gun down a civilian outside a hospital.
Nine Russian servicemen are killed in an attack by the Mujahideen in the capital's suburbs.
A village head is murdered by Islamists.
A school headmaster is murdered by Islamists.
The Taliban stop a vehicle carrying two humanitarian aid workers then execute each with a shot to the back of the head.
Suicide bomber rams his car into a police convoy, killing four and injuring about thirty.
Jihad car bombing kills two Iraqis and leaves fourteen others injured.
The Taliban ambush and murder nine Afghan police officers.
Two men sitting in a car are machine-gunned to death by Islamic separatists.
Militant Islamist hurls a grenade into a crowd of people, injuring at least ten civilians.
The Mujahideen kill five people and injure at least two others in a suicide assault on a government building in the region's capital.
A young girl is among the three people killed by a Sunni car bombing.  Eight others are injured, two critically.
Islamic suicide bomber drives an explosive-packed vehicle into a police compound, killing fifteen and leaving another two dozen in various stages of agony.
Muslim terrorists kill seven people over a two day stretch that includes a Buddhist grocery store owner and a village chief.
Three weeks after a truce-signing, a Palestinian suicide bomber kills five Israelis outside a nightclub.  Forty-nine others in line are injured.
Shia extremists kill three Sunnis as they are walking out of a mosque.
Islamists murder a civilian in a coconut plantation.
A man is gunned down as he is walking to a local market.
Two people in a small Algerian town are killed when religious fundamentalists set off a bomb.
Car bomber kills eight people and Jihad gunmen kill another four in a separate incident, also in Mosul.
Two Afghan cops are gunned down by the Taliban.
Hizb-ul-Mujahideen terrorists capture, disarm and then execute two Indian soldiers.
The Mujahideen kidnap a 17-year-old boy from his home and then kill him.
A Fedayeen suicide car bomber blows his way to paradise by driving into a crowd of unemployed Iraqis, taking the lives of more than one-hundred souls, most of whom were Christian.
Arab militias with the support of the Islamic government attack a village and kill seventeen civilians and injure a dozen others including several women who were raped.
One policeman is killed, and sixteen others injured when the Mujahideen attack their station.
A government official is killed in a shooting attack by militant Muslims.
Muslim terrorists murder three civilians in separate random shooting attacks.
Militant Muslims injure ten people with a bomb outside a shrine.
Two suicide car bombings kills thirteen Iraqis and wound thirty.  In a separate attack, a judge and his son are gunned down.
Islamic terrorists fire on a pickup carrying four people, killing one.
Five people are killed by two Fedayeen suicide bombers outside a government building.
Jihad car bombing kills one civilian and injures three.
A man is shot off of his motorcycle by Muslim militants.
Gema’ah Islamiyah terrorists, disguised as fully-veiled Muslim women open fire on a police checkpoint, killing two Thai officers.
Two young civilians are gunned down by Islamic militants in a motorcycle attack.
British national gunned down by a Taliban terrorist while waiting at a traffic light.
Jihadists murder a dozen people, mostly civilians with a car bombing in a residential neighborhood.
al-Qaeda suicide bomber accounts for most of the fifteen people dead in four attacks.  At least twenty-six others are injured.
Two Israelis are wounded by a Palestinian sniper.
Three people, including two Buddhists and a businesswoman are murdered in three separate attacks by Muslim terrorists.
Christian pastor attacked and beheaded by Muslim extremists as he is returning home from work.
Sunni government official shot to death by Shia militants while waiting for a bus.
The bodies of forty-one people, massacred by Jihadists, are found.  All had been executed, many were beheaded, including several women and young children.
Two suicide bombers drive a garbage truck packed with explosives into a hotel, killing two others and injuring several dozen.
Devout Sunni blows himself up inside a Shiite mosque, taking fifty lives and leaving about a hundred other people badly injured.
The Moro Islamic Front attacks a military patrol, killing five and injuring four.
Islamic extremists set up a fake roadblock, then machine-gun two policemen to death in their vehicle.
Muslims kill two American security contractors with a roadside bomb.
Sunni Jihadists kill a police officer's wife and two young children then shoot three other policemen attending the funeral a day later.
The Mujahideen ambush a search party, killing at least one person.  They also kill a civilian at his home (Gagrot Piri).
Three car bombings kill a total of four civilians, including two farmers.
Abu Sayyaf militant grabs a gun and shoots three prison guards to death.
Seven people standing outside a bank are injured when the Mujahideen hurl a grenade at them.
A leader of the terrorist group, Hizb-ul-Mujahideen, kills two people in making an escape from jail.
Suicide bomber successfully kills a young child and injures four others.
Jihad car bombing kills four civilians and injures seven.
A policeman is killed and three other people injured when Muslim separatists set off a bomb at a railway station.
al-Qaeda suicide bomber kills three soldiers and injures eight other people, including civilians.
The Taliban detonate a roadside bomb targeting a humanitarian convoy that kills two women, two men and one Afghan child.  Thirty-two others are injured.
Three people are killed when the Mujahideen hurl a grenade at a restaurant.
Two Muslim men rape a Christian girl and then poison her.
A school principal is gunned down by Islamic radicals.
The Mujahideen kill an 8-year-old boy by tossing a grenade into a school.  Six of his classmates sustain critical injuries.
Jihad insurgents gun down a police officer, then kill three others at his funeral procession.
Syrian-backed terrorists set off a car bomb in a Christian neighborhood, killing two innocents.
Egyptian suicide bomber slams his car into a theatre, killing a British national and injuring sixteen others in the Qatari capital.
Three separate shooting attacks by Islamic militants leave at least two villagers dead, including a Buddhist man shot in the back of the head while sitting in his tea shop.
Two civilians are murdered in a Taliban attack.
A suicide bomber walks into a government building and kills three others.  Jihadists then open fire on the subsequent funeral, killing two others.
Radical Sunni suicide bomber blows up a Shia religious festival near a Pakistani shrine, killing about three dozen and injuring many more.
One civilian is killed, and thirteen other people injured by two bombs placed by Islamic separatists, one near a river pavilion.
A roadside bombing rips through the bodies of four women and three children riding in a vehicle.
Three people, including two women, are murdered in a Jihad car bombing.
Islamic separatists open fire on a restaurant, killing one customer and injuring three others.
A guard is killed by Islamic militants.
Roadside blast kills four civilians.  Elsewhere (in Kut), the bodies of six captured soldiers are found bound and executed.
Two government employees are shot to death by the Taliban.
The Mujahideen kill a civilian and injure several other people with a car bomb in a shopping district.
Three people are killed when Muslim terrorists detonate an 80kg bomb in a shopping center in a Christian area north of Beirut.
A rubber plantation owner has his life cut short by Islamic radicals.
A former village headsman is assassinated by terrorists.
Islamic terrorists assassinate a government official.
Hizb-ul-Mujahideen invade a civilian's home, kidnap his son and nephew then execute them in captivity.
Jihad gunmen open up on a van carrying cleaning women from their job at an American base.  Five women are shot to death.
A female Christian college student is kidnapped and beaten to death by Shiite radicals.  A man coming to her rescue is murdered as well.
Four people, including an elderly Buddhist monk are injured by a bomb that Islamic militants trigger with a cell phone.
A judge is one of two people murdered by religious extremists in separate attacks.
Two civilian, including an elderly man, are beaten and shot to death in their home by Islamic rebels.
Muslim terrorists abduct a civilian then slit his throat a day later.
Two Shia pilgrims are killed, and nineteen others injured by a Sunni suicide bomber as they are marching to the shrine city.
Fedayeen suicide bomber kills eleven police officers at a checkpoint and injures another fourteen.
Sixteen people are injured and one killed when the Mujahideen lob a grenade near a crowded bus stop.
Four policemen are killed, and six wounded, in an attack on their station by radical Sunni.
Bomb in a predominately Christian suburb injures five.
Two railway worker are murdered by Muslim radicals as they are taking a break.
Four Afghan military guards are blown to bits in a Taliban rocket attack on a government building.
Mujahideen militants set fire to a civilian's house after killing his mother, wife and infant daughter.  They also murder a neighbor.
Six Iraqis are killed by Jihadists in and around Baqubah in several shooting attacks.
Religious fanatic blows himself up, also killing two U.S. soldiers.
Four Islamic militants open fire on an church Easter service, killing at least one Christian and injuring six other worshippers.
Bombing and shooting attack on a train by Muslim separatists results in more than a dozen casualties.
Muslim terrorists ambush a local security patrol, killing two and injuring eight.
Sunni extremist kills seven Shia pilgrims at a religious event with a suicide car bombing.  At least nine others are injured.
Islamic extremists ambush and kill four Yemeni policemen.
The Taliban ambush and kill four policemen in a remote area.
The Salafist Group for Preaching and Combat kidnaps a 32-year-old man then slits his throat.
Lashkar-e-Toiba terrorists kill a boy who refuses to courier money for them.
Suicide bicycle bomber pedals his way to Paradise, taking five other souls with him including three civilians.
Sunni extremists open fire on Shiite pilgrims making their way to a religious festival, killing at least one person.
Four Jihadi gunmen open fire on a street, killing six people and injuring another eight in what appeared to be a suicide attack.
The bodies of three shepherds abducted and executed by the Mujahideen two days earlier are found.
The Mujahideen kidnap and kill two villagers from their home.  Elsewhere in Kashmir three other civilians are killed in separate attacks.
Fedayeen suicide bomber murders five others, including a child, outside a shrine.
Civilians standing near a tractor are murdered in a Taliban bombing.
Taliban extremists kill three truck drivers and then burn their vehicles.
Bomb placed outside a shopping center in a Christian resort village by Syrian-backed terrorists injures a dozen.
Sunni gunmen kill a Shiite cleric in his car in an attack that also injures his young daughter and two of her friends.
The Taliban kill four people, including two children, in two bomb attacks (the second in Mazar-i-Sharif).
Car bomb kills five Iraqis and injures another five.  A government minister of education is gunned down in a separate attack.
A Buddhist man is murdered by Muslims while sitting in his pick-up truck with his children.
Muslim extremists attack a government building, killing nine Afghan soldiers.
Three farmers are killed when Islamic fundamentalists with suspected ties to al-Qaeda set off a roadside bomb in Algeria.
The Salafist Group for Preaching and Combat stab and shoot a shepherd to death.
One man is murdered in an IED attack by Muslim separatists. Two sappers are blown apart in a separate bombing.
Islamic militants set off three bombs, killing five and injuring at least eighty.  The fatalities were from the bomb set at the airport.  The other two bombs were at a hotel and a department store.
Islamic fundamentalists stage an ambush on a police convoy, massacring five officers.
Pakistani Fedayeen take Indian border guards by surprise, killing two Hindus and injuring three before fleeing.
Two village guards are murdered by Islamic radicals while riding in their truck.
Three civilians are murdered by the Taliban.
Mujahideen bomb intended for a passenger bus explodes early, injuring seven civilians.
Video posted on the Internet showing two young men brutally stabbed to death as assailants yell "Allah Akbar."
Algerian fundamentalists set up a fake roadblock then slaughter the trapped victims and set fire to their cars.
Islamist detonates a nail-packed bomb in a shopping area, killing a French woman and two others, including an American tourist.  Eighteen others are injured.
Fedayeen suicide attack on the bus terminal housing elderly 'freedom riders' is largely unsuccessful.  Two attackers are killed.
A priest and his Christian driver are detained then stabbed to death by Muslim extremists, who also cut off the hands, noses and ears of the victims.
Arab militia raids an African village, killing at least seventeen and torching homes.  A small mosque was one of only two structures spared.
Two civilians are shot to death by Islamic fundamentalists.
The bodies of ten civilians, abducted, bound and executed by Jihadis are found.
In a senseless killing, members of the "Islamic Army" stop a vehicle carrying non-uniformed Iraqi soldiers and machine-gun them to death.
The Taliban murder a government official taken hostage two days earlier.
Islamic insurgents detonate a roadside bomb, killing two civilians and injuring thirteen others.
Islamic militant hurls a grenade into a group of pedestrians, killing two and injuring twenty.
The Mujahideen kill four people in four separate shooting attacks across the region and take three policemen hostage.
Fourteen Christians are killed in an attack on their villages by Muslim militants in the large African nation.
Three remarkably inefficient suicide bombers manage to send themselves to Allah, but not anyone else.
Fedayeen suicide bomber blows his pickup truck to pieces in a crowded market, killing three civilians an injuring more than twenty others.
Two civilians are murdered by Islamic gunmen in separate attacks.
Muslim terrorists kill a civilian, then burn his body.
The Mujahideen shoot a woman to death in front of her house.
Fedayeen suicide bomber murders five civilians on a city street.
A suicide car bomber manages to kill five Iraqis and injure eight.  Most of the victims were children.
An ambush by MILF terrorists leave four people dead.
Two civilians are shot to death in an ambush by religious fundamentalists.  Five others are injured in the attack.
Religious fundamentalists kill three security guards and injure three others in three different bombings.
A policeman is killed and two others injured as Islamic militants plant a bomb on a road leading to the airport.
Muslim terrorists plant a decoy bomb near another live one that kills a dozen policemen while they are trying to defuse the decoy.
al-Qaeda sets off two car bombs on a crowded city street, massacring eighteen people and injuring about forty others.
Ansar al-Sunnah terrorists gun down five police officers and one civilian in a single attack.
Suicide bomber takes four Iraqi with him.  Six others are badly injured.
Religious extremists bomb a hotel, killing two civilians.
Three people are killed, and several dozen injured in sectarian rioting.
Religious extremist blows himself up, killing three other civilians and wounding six.  One of the women killed was described as 'Angel of Mercy.'
Radical Sunnis detonate a bomb in a restaurant, killing nine patrons and injuring over a dozen.
The Mujahideen kill a young boy with an IED.
One truck driver is killed, and three others injured when Taliban extremists attack their oil convoy with rockets.
Suspected Islamists open fire on a Swedish humanitarian aid vehicle, killing an aid worker and injuring two others.
Radical Muslims gun down a man sitting in a tea shop.
Islamic terrorists detonate a bomb at a busy intersection, killing a civilian.
Two American soldiers are killed by a Fedayeen suicide bomber.
Islamist blows himself to Allah in a green minivan, taking four Iraqi police recruits with him and injuring thirty-eight others
A man is murdered by Muslim terrorists while leaving a tea shop.
The Mujahideen take out a vegetable vendor and another innocent woman in a grenade attack on a shopping district.
Three terrorist attacks, including an ambush on a truck convoy, leave four civilians dead and at least thirteen injured, some critically.
Jihadis mark the birth of Muhammad by abducting nineteen Iraqi soldiers in civilian clothes heading home to celebrate the holiday with their families.  The men are then executed at a soccer stadium.
Pakistani mob chases a 'blasphemer' up a tree before lynching him.
A gentle Buddhist man is shot to death by Muslim radicals.
A hospital gardener is murdered by Islamic terrorists.
Women and children are amply represented among the more than fifty bodies pulled out of a river after having their throats cut by Islamist kidnappers.
Yelling "Allah Akbar" Islamists bring down a civilian helicopter with a missile, killing ten.  The lone survivor is helped to is feet, then shot to death.
Saudi Islamists kill two Saudi policemen.
A man is murdered by Muslims while driving to work.
A government employee is murdered by the Taliban.
Two Algerian civilians die in a bomb attack by Islamic fundamentalists.
Muslim militants kill a civilian with a bomb hidden in a garbage can.
Two youths are killed in separate attacks by the Mujahideen.  One has his throat slit.
Twelve people, including a 10-year-old boy, are killed when religious extremists bomb a Shia mosque.  Twenty-six others are badly injured.
Radical Sunnis murder a 7-year-old girl with a roadside bomb.
The Salafist Group for Preaching and Combat shoots two family members to death, then kills two community guards in separate attacks.
A woman is brutally stabbed to death by her brother and cousin after refusing an arranged marriage.
Multiple bombings by Jihadis, including at least one suicide attack, leave thirteen Iraqis dead and at least thirty injured.
A civilian is killed by Islamic terrorists.
The Taliban attack a government building, killing two security staff.
Islamic terrorists kill an imam who turned them away.
At least six Christian villagers are killed by their Muslim neighbors after refusing to 'return to Islam.'
Sunni extremists plow a car into a crowd of people outside an ice cream shop in a Shia neighborhood, then detonate the vehicle as others rush to help the victims.
Jihadis murder six policemen with two bombs.  Nearly three dozen others are injured.
Militant Muslims kill two Thai policemen with a remote-controlled bomb that injures three civilians as well.
A political activist is kidnapped by the Mujahideen and then shot to death.
Abu Sayyaf terrorists kill two Philippine soldiers with a bomb.  Five others are badly injured.
Followers of a radical Shiite throw a bomb from a car window, killing two, including a student and injuring two others.
Four police officers are killed in an ambush by Taliban terrorists on their convoy.
A civilian is murdered by the Taliban.
The Mujahideen abduct and murder an Indian school teacher.
Shiite cleric gunned down on his way to work.
Muslims kill a teacher and injure his nephew.
Algerian fundamentalists kill two soldiers in a terror bombing.
Seven separate suicide bombings by Muslim extremists leave more than forty people dead and at least one-hundred and twenty injured.  Women and children are among the victims.
A Russian cop and three civilians are killed by Islamic militants.
A government employee is killed by armed Muslims.
A man is murdered by Muslim terrorists.
Two women in veils stage a shooting attack on a tour bus.  They are the only fatalities, but nine innocents are injured.
A series of five bombings kills at least eleven and injures dozens.
The Taliban kill three women, at least one of whom was an aid worker.
A Jihad car bomb kills four civilians and injures another five.
Iraqi policemen are shot to death by al-Qaeda operatives at a checkpoint.
A Kurdish funeral is the target of a suicidal religious fanatic, who kills at least twenty-five others and injures about fifty mourners.
Islamic Jihad kills a 21-year-old Israeli soldier.
Taliban fundamentalists kill two police officers with a terrorist bomb.
The Mujahideen attack a security patrol, killing one personnel.
Twenty-three Iraqis, including children are killed in eight car bombings by Muslim extremists.  More than fifty are badly injured.
Islamic radicals fire on a man and his wife as they are returning from working in an orchard.
Militant Muslims murder a civilian working in his field.
A political figure is assassinated by the Mujahideen, along with three civilians and a police officer.
Fourteen people are injured when an Islamic terrorist lobs a grenade into the road near a bus stop.
A postal worker is murdered by Islamists.

al-Qaeda murders thirty Shiites in a street bombing in an industrial area.  About forty others are injured in the blast.

al-Qaeda shoots a 50-year-old schoolteacher to death.
